name: Promolta, Inc.
description: Operator of a self-serve video distribution platform intended to promote various YouTube videos. The company's online platform leverages technology to help musicians and artists distribute their videos on targeted blogs, sites, games, apps, and social networks, enabling clients to increase their reach and awareness.
